org.fishwife.jrugged.aspects

Annotation Type CircuitBreaker


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface CircuitBreaker
    Marks a method as one to be wrapped with a CircuitBreaker.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String name
      Name of the circuit.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      Class<? extends Throwable>[] ignore
      Exception types that the CircuitBreaker will ignore (pass through transparently without tripping).
      int limit
      Specifies the number of failures that must occur within a configured time window in order to trip the circuit breaker.
      long resetMillis
      Amount of time in milliseconds after tripping after which the CircuitBreaker is reset and will allow a test request through.
      long windowMillis
      Specifies the length of the measurement window for failure tolerances in milliseconds.

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract String name
        Name of the circuit. Each annotation with a shared value shares the same CircuitBreaker.
        Returns:
        the value

      • ignore

        public abstract Class<? extends Throwable>[] ignore
        Exception types that the CircuitBreaker will ignore (pass through transparently without tripping).
        Returns:
        the Exception types.
        Default:
        {}

      • windowMillis

        public abstract long windowMillis
        Specifies the length of the measurement window for failure tolerances in milliseconds. i.e. if limit failures occur within windowMillis milliseconds, the breaker will trip.
        Returns:
        the length of the measurement window.
        Default:
        -1L

      • limit

        public abstract int limit
        Specifies the number of failures that must occur within a configured time window in order to trip the circuit breaker.
        Returns:
        the number of failures.
        Default:
        -1

      • resetMillis

        public abstract long resetMillis
        Amount of time in milliseconds after tripping after which the CircuitBreaker is reset and will allow a test request through.
        Returns:
        the amount of time in milliseconds.
        Default:
        -1L
